name: Cosmet Beauty
overview:
CosmetBeauty.com is an information site on health, beauty and cosmetics. It focuses on everything to do with visual appearance and the various options available. There are essential 3 sorts of information available:

  • Beauty treatments
  • Skin conditions
  • Beauty products

The site looks at low risk & non invasive treatment solutions only. Unlike most beauty sites it doesn’t heavily look at make up and unlike health sites it doesn’t look at lots of non cosmetic conditions.

The aim of the site is to educate individuals on their options which don’t involve expensive or invasive treatments. This is done through the following methods:

  • How to style articles with information on home remedies.
  • General overviews where people can learn about new treatments.
  • More detailed articles looking at the exact conditions a treatment can help with.
  • Articles targeting specific common questions or misconceptions about a product or treatment.
  • Overviews of home based products.
